post.title: Indian dinner #1
post.content:
You can write stuff

Here is a list of just some of the features:

  • Social media integration
  • User comments
  • Supported in all major browsers
  • Phone and tablet support
  • Fast and responsive
  • RSS/ATOM feeds
  • Windows/Open Live Writer/Markdown Monster support
